heading: HB01371
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FOR LOCAL ABSENTEE VOTING FOR LAWYERS
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2017-05-29, transmitted to the Senate on 2017-05-31 and received by the Senate on 2017-05-31 Substituted by HB05661
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01371
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR LOCAL ABSENTEE VOTING FOR LAWYERS
ABSTRACT : Provides for means for lawyers who are stationed away from their residences on election days to cast their votes on national elections in the precincts nearest them, subject to reasonable regulations by the Commission of Election (COMELEC).
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Maceda (072 2017-02-20)2. Abayon (074 2017-02-22)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE

      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 45, 743, 1371, 1372, 1373, 2486, 2487, 4539 and 5019 was approved with amendment.
